name: Unity Nexus
description: A wide futuristic architectural model of a temple integrated with a pyramid design. The structure features a pyramid base with sleek, reflective materials like glass and steel, merging into a modern temple with arches, columns, and a central glowing dome at the top. The design incorporates elements of various cultures, including geometric patterns, cascading waterfalls, and surrounding greenery. The atmosphere is majestic and harmonious, with soft ambient lighting highlighting the structure's details, symbolizing unity and innovation.

name: Crystal Sanctum
description: A grand and luxurious futuristic architectural model of a temple integrated with a pyramid design, radiating an aura of spirituality and sanctity. The structure features an elaborate pyramid base made of shimmering gold and crystal materials, transitioning into a majestic temple with intricate carvings, glowing energy symbols, and sacred geometries. The top is crowned with a radiant, glowing orb, symbolizing divine energy. Surrounding the temple are lush gardens, flowing water features, and pathways illuminated by ethereal lighting. The atmosphere is serene yet awe-inspiring, evoking a sense of wonder and spiritual connection.

name: Mystic Prism
description: A futuristic and grand architectural model of a temple integrated with a pyramid design, glowing with a radiant purple aura. The structure features a pyramid base crafted with reflective materials like glass and crystal, transitioning into a modern temple adorned with intricate patterns, sacred symbols, and arches. The central dome at the top emits a bright purple glow, symbolizing mystical energy. The surroundings include vibrant gardens, cascading waterfalls, and pathways illuminated by soft purple and white lighting. The overall atmosphere is magical, ethereal, and spiritually uplifting.

name: Spectrum Spire
description: A futuristic and grand architectural model of a temple integrated with a pyramid design, glowing with a radiant purple aura and adorned with sparkling orange, blue, and green lights. The structure features a pyramid base crafted with reflective materials like glass and crystal, transitioning into a modern temple with intricate sacred symbols and arches. The central dome at the top emits a bright purple glow surrounded by colorful sparkling lights, symbolizing mystical energy. The surroundings include vibrant gardens, cascading waterfalls, and pathways illuminated by a blend of purple, orange, blue, and green lighting. The atmosphere is magical, ethereal, and spiritually uplifting.

name: Celestial Crown
description: A highly luxurious and majestic futuristic temple integrated with a pyramid design, featuring an opulent structure glowing with radiant purple light and adorned with sparkling orange, blue, and green accents. The pyramid base is crafted with shimmering gold and crystal materials, transitioning into a grand temple with intricate sacred carvings, glowing geometric patterns, and celestial symbols. The central dome at the top radiates a powerful purple aura surrounded by vibrant sparkling lights. The surroundings include lush, perfectly manicured gardens, dynamic cascading waterfalls, and illuminated pathways that blend purple, gold, and multicolor lighting. The atmosphere exudes divine energy, spiritual magnificence, and awe-inspiring beauty.
